title: Where can you park for free at the New Hanover County beaches?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=2312 http://www.myreporter.com/?p=1220 And of course, Wrightsville Beach DOES have free parking, located at the tennis and basketball courts. It's about an 8-minute walk, but well worth it if it's just you and not a large family.
